General.Name: Industrial Investment Trust Limited
General.Description: Industrial Investment Trust Limited, a non-banking financial company, engages in the investment activities in India. It invests in securities, including shares, mutual funds, debentures, and bonds. The company also provides private equity, margin funding, and loans and advances. In addition, it engages in the real estate development activities and construction of residential complexes, as well as offers real estate advisory services. The company was incorporated in 1933 and is based in Mumbai, India.
